text: I reported it to Tanja in the live chat. She said she made an internal emergency help request.

Hello everyone, I just joined the slack so I hope this is the correct channel to ask this question : I would need to access CRM contact lists from the HubSpot of our different clients through API, what is the correct way to tackle this issue? Is the only way to reach several HubSpot's accounts (not just the one from my organisation) to be present in the app marketplace and share the app to our clients? Any link to the relevant documentation would be much appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello everyone
I wanted to know if we can update the currency and other currencies under settings>account setup>account defaults? And it has to be done through the API endpoints?|
I can fetch currencies but can't update it.
Best way to move the notes only corresponding to the contacts from one HubSpot portal to another ?

I would maybe use the email as key (providing this is same in both) and use the APIs to pull data from one account and push to the other account, you would need a API key for each account to make the API calls from one and to the other.
In notes we dont get the email of the contact only owner id

So you would need to use the contact id to do API call and lookup the contact details, grab the email, I am new the HubSpot API myself but I would guess they have an endpoint to get contact details like this.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
Scroll down to READ, you can call API endpoint with contact ID, pull back email in response, use it.
Not sure if there is endpoint to find by email, if not you need to pull contact information from both accounts, get ID and email, then loop through them to push notes to the other account.
hey miles!  I am going to take a look at this.  I will be away from the computer a lot of the day so may get this into someone else’s hands.
Can we get the Deal-> pipeline ->records using api  in a single api?
<@U04RBVBG5CZ> you're very right I also see this happening
definitely a problem
Possible option is a dynamic redirect url that store the state instead of passing it through the auth request url
(haven't tested this but think it works)
records meaning associations?

Check out the *`/crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId}` endpoint.* 

You add add `properties` and `associations` to get the fields and associations you want.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals|Doc link>.

I'm trying to create an association between a company and a deal via custom code.  It works when I don't have the label just fine, but when I add in the label it fails.  I think I'm missing something that's right in front of me, but I can't figure out what.
do you want to share your code?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C011F74BKQW/p1683297863775279>
<@UUX58C0S3> try to post your question in only one place. :+1:

Hello, I'm trying to find a way to extract notes and attachments for each ticket. I'm able to get the ticket IDs with the Get all tickets call, does anyone know how to get all the notes and attachments for each ticket?
Does anyone have a working example they can share of creating an html email and associating it with deal activity?
